ProductDescription: The Beauty is in the name.Wear this rakish grey plaid jacket and all will know that you are the Boss.Named after the 3 time Melboume Cup winning champion Jacket of Makybe Diva,Glen,Boss,Featuring a notch lapel and made from perminum super 130%s 100% wool.-Length:109cm -Regular fit -Wrap-style front -Ruched Detailing-Invisible Zip Fastening on the back
